coreAttributes.authorTag: An inscription written in crayon on the pie packaging reads 'Packed tight by Tasty's Secret Priest Sauce LLC'
coreAttributes.name: Mud Pie
coreAttributes.description: A hastily folded up package of homemade mud pie. A logo printed on the top of the box shows a busty monkey-girl in a skimpy chef's outfit with no back, looking behind her at the consumer, her ass on display, her tail twisted up into a heart, a mud pie in held up in her hand, a wink in her eye and a smile on her face.

useDescriptions.selfUse: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(open)] the package and [npc.verb(breathe)] in the scent of hot homemade chocolate and cream. Unable to resist the delicious-looking pie found inside, [npc.she] [npc.verb(start)] shoving the entire pie into [npc.her] mouth until nothing but crumbs are left behind.
useDescriptions.otherUse: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(open)] the package and [npc.verb(hold)] it out to [npc2.name], allowing [npc2.herHim] to breathe in the scent of hot homemade chocolate and cream. Unable to resist the delicious-looking pie found inside, [npc2.she] [npc2.verb(start)] shoving the entire pie into [npc2.her] mouth until nothing but crumbs are left behind.
